question: Can we establish scrum on the team?
Can we manage teams of directors and creators remotely to make a Really Cool book, animated short film, comics, etc?
Can we document the process of making these stories for other independent publishers?
Can we use social media to build a global audience for these Really Cool stories?
Can we create spaces for the team, directors and creators to meet and share with each other?
Can we run a successful Kickstarter campaign for an animated series?
Can we design a meaningful membership program to run the studio?
Can we help other people raise money for their Really Cool ideas?
